description:
Almayce unleashes a horde of monsters to locate the last weapon, and only Lina and the gang can stop their rampage! When they encounter Jillas, he holds a weapon as powerful as Lina`s mightiest spell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Three People, Three Ways! Where the Light Leads!
Trois personnes différentes ! En direction de la lumière !
Трое на распутье! Куда укажет свет!
三者三様! 光の示す先!
